title: ‘The Skin of Our Teeth’ Review: Apocalypse Now at Lincoln Center
sub_head: Thornton Wilder’s comedy about a family that endures calamities across millennia feels simultaneously up-to-date and aged.
body:
New York
Unless you have been dozing for the past two years, you may have noticed that things are looking pretty apocalyptic out there. The pandemic has claimed the lives of almost a million Americans. Extreme weather events have become so frequent they hardly make headlines. Russia’s brutal war in Ukraine is killing thousands.
